movie.title: Aruvi
movie.description_intro: The channel has show where people express their problems and the show helps to slove the problems. The protagonist, a young girl Aruvi also goes there and shares the fact that she was raped by 3 people. The show call the culprits and the producer also see her and makes a plan to bed her. The twists and turns begin in show . She targets one of them with gun and asks him to tell a story which will make her cry. The person seems rough and hard. He says he doesn't know. The she asks when he had cried last . He replies a month back. Then he goes on to narrate why did he cry.
movie.description_full: The channel has show where people express their problems and the show helps to slove the problems. The protagonist, a young girl Aruvi also goes there and shares the fact that she was raped by 3 people. The show call the culprits and the producer also see her and makes a plan to bed her. The twists and turns begin in show . She targets one of them with gun and asks him to tell a story which will make her cry. The person seems rough and hard. He says he doesn't know. The she asks when he had cried last . He replies a month back. Then he goes on to narrate why did he cry.

movies.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
movies.summary: As the global economy teeters on the brink of disaster, a young Wall Street trader partners with disgraced former Wall Street corporate raider Gordon Gekko on a two-tiered mission: To alert the financial community to the coming doom, and to find out who was responsible for the death of the young trader's mentor.
movies.description_full: As the global economy teeters on the brink of disaster, a young Wall Street trader partners with disgraced former Wall Street corporate raider Gordon Gekko on a two-tiered mission: To alert the financial community to the coming doom, and to find out who was responsible for the death of the young trader's mentor.

movies.title: Montana
movies.summary: Claire is a tough gang member that has to find the Boss' mistress, Kitty, who ran away from him. She is accompanied by Boss' trigger-happy son Jimmy. Claire's colleague gangster Nick is terminally ill and cancer starts to take over him.
movies.description_full: Claire is a tough gang member that has to find the Boss' mistress, Kitty, who ran away from him. She is accompanied by Boss' trigger-happy son Jimmy. Claire's colleague gangster Nick is terminally ill and cancer starts to take over him.

movies.title: Horus: Prince of the Sun
movies.summary: Horus, a kid living in an unnamed Scandinavian/Eastern Europe culture of the Iron Age, recovers the Sword of the Sun from the rock giant Moog and learns from his dying father that he must returns to his ancestral territory. In the process, he defends a village from the attacks of Grundewald, a warlord/ice demon and befriends the enigmatic Hilda, a lonely and beautiful girl who sings haunting songs (and who hides a terrible secret).

movies.title: King of Crime
movies.summary: King of Crime is about Marcus King, an old school gangster, a crime lord, who has left behind old school crime. He has manoeuvred his business into the leafy lanes of the suburbs and now, in place of pimps and dealers, his team consists of the best graduate geeks that money can bribe. No brothels, no casinos and no drugs - he's dragged serious, organised crime well and truly into the twenty-first century. From credit card cloning and skimming to Internet spamming and scamming, he is the king of Cyber Land.
